SELECT permissionuser.id , permissionuser.deleted , permissionuser.created_at as createdAt , permissionuser.modified_at as modifiedAt
, permissionuser.permission_id as permissionId , permissionuser.user_id as userId
, user.username as userUsername
FROM permissionuser, user WHERE permissionuser.id = #{id} AND permissionuser.user_id = user.id
SELECT count(permissionuser.id) as listsize FROM permissionuser

SELECT permissionuser.id FROM permissionuser
ORDER BY permissionuser.id ORDER BY permissionuser.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT permissionuser.id FROM permissionuser
AND #{mark} > permissionuser.id ORDER BY permissionuser.id DESC
AND permissionuser.id > #{mark} ORDER BY permissionuser.id ASC
AND #{mark} > CONCAT(permissionuser.title, '_', permissionuser.id) ORDER BY permissionuser.title DESC
AND CONCAT(permissionuser.title, '_', permissionuser.id) > #{mark} ORDER BY permissionuser.title ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
